item.title: LA fires live updates: How the Palisades Village managed to survive the firestorm
item.description: At least 24 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: WATCH: Woman whose wedding ring was found in rubble after California fire shares her story
item.description: Victoria DeSantis' Altadena house was completely destroyed by the Eaton fire, but firefighters helped her uncover a symbol of hope amid the rubble.

item.title: Kate Middleton says her cancer is in remission
item.description: Kate announced her cancer diagnosis in March and underwent chemotherapy.

item.title: Los Angeles fire losses could reach $30 billion for insurers
item.description: Disaster already the "costliest wildfire event in California history," report finds.

item.title: Trump asks appeals court to reconsider overturning $5 million E. Jean Carroll verdict
item.description: President-elect Trump is asking a federal appeals court to reconsider overturning a jury's verdict that found he sexually abused writer E. Jean Carrol...
